snippet: The image of China’s most enduring pop-folk icon, Peng Liyuan, has been made over since Xi Jinping was set on the path to being party secretary.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Peng Liyuan, China’s most enduring pop-folk icon and wife of newly anointed top leader Xi Jinping; Peng certainly has what it takes to revolutionize China’s stodgy first lady paradigm, in which spouses of top leaders are usually kept out of sight or stand mute behind their husbands during state visits.

byline.contributor: Mia Li and Chang Lu contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The image of China’s most enduring pop-folk icon, Peng Liyuan, has been made over since Xi Jinping was set on the path to being party secretary.

headline.seo: Peng Liyuan, First Lady of China, Dimmed Her Star
headline.main: A Star in China Both Rises and Sets
headline.print_headline: A Star In China Both Rises And Sets
